mapper.sql: company_id, company_name, company_address, contact, phone, email, dept_id
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_company (company_id, company_name, company_address, contact, phone, email, dept_id) values (#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tbl_company
company_id,
company_name,
company_address,
contact,
phone,
email,
dept_id,

mapper.update:
update tbl_company
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_address = #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_company set company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_address = #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from tbl_company
AND company_name like CONCAT('%', #{companyName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
